articles.author: PMB Desk
articles.title: Study reveals 42% of skin disease patients suffer from sleep disturbances - Pune Mirror
articles.description: This research, presented at the European Academy of Dermatology and Venereology (EADV) Congress 2023 in Berlin, Germany, demonstrates that these sleep disruptions have broader implications on the quality of life for affected individuals
articles.content: A comprehensive study conducted across 20 countries, involving over 50,000 adults, has unveiled that a substantial 42% of patients with skin diseases endure sleep disturbances. This research, present… [+1851 chars]
